text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Looking at the situation of COVID-19 all around states please extend the lockdown till 30th of May.  Sir, I m from Madhya Pradesh and the condition is very serious thought our CM trying his best but the ground reality what I saw unbelievable...Sir, take a good care of yourself 🙏
